DOC.detailed_description: The aim study compare effect endurance resistance exercise endothelial function patient type 1 diabetes mellitus ( T1DM ) . For purpose , sample size consist 15 patient DM1 , age 18 45 year , undertake two type exercise , randomly distribute . Ergospirometry test perform order ass possible contraindication propose protocol well functional capacity , use prescription endurance exercise session . Similarly , strength maximal testing conduct used prescription resistance exercise session . The endothelial function evaluate vascular reactivity forearm circulate endothelial progenitor cell ( EPC ) counting . To analyze vascular reactivity forearm , non-invasive venous occlusion plethysmography use , whereas flow cytometry method use analysis number circulate EPC . The endurance exercise session consist 40 minute cycle heart rate correspond 60 % VO2 max . The resistance exercise session last 40 minute , consist 4 set 12 repetition 60 % 1RM , four exercise low limb . The research perform Exercise Pathophysiology Research Laboratory Hospital de Clinicas de Porto Alegre . The investigator expect find great increase number circulate EPC endurance exercise session , compare benefit obtain session resistance exercise . Likewise , expect find great benefit relation vascular reactivity forearm session endurance exercise compare session resistance exercise . Considering part study analyze effect physical exercise vascular function involve patient DM1 , project aim provide clear picture benefit different exercise acute response endothelial function patient .
